text:
Welcome Welcome Welcome Welcome to
AI Academy.

Right from the moment generative
AI burst into the mainstream,

it was evident that it is
unlike any technology

to helping enterprises
use GenAI to improve their business.

How effectively and efficiently you manage
your data has real

Gen AI is the hottest topic in business
right now, but spoiler

alert it's not always the right play
for every use case.

generative AI is going to change
marketing, how we work, how we create,

and how we deliver exceptional experiences
for customers.
Whatever comes next for AI, it's

going to be safer
if it's open, transparent and inclusive.

companies that adopt an AI first mindset
are the ones that will innovate

in ways that change the world,
And that's the opportunity ahead

for all of us now with Gen
AI to radically rethink what is possible

and then to go
out there and make it happen.
